attributes.action: request the erection of wind turbines on the two River Severn motorway bridges, the Humber [road] Bridge the Forth Road Bridge and other lengthy road and railway bridges wherever possible.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All of the bridges that I have named above are very high and cross wide estuaries, making them very exposed to high winds. Wherever structurally possible wind turbines should be erected along their length.
Please see my other still current, (November 2007), petitions requesting tidal barrages to be built across The Solent, the Strait of Dover and the Thames Estuary, all of which could carry wind turbines along their length, plus requesting the scrapping of nuclear / atomic power stations.
Someone else has petitioned for a tidal barrage across the River Severn Estuary, please sign that too.
